description:
Complete captivating puzzles featuring realistic images of beautiful women. With each completed image, you'll unlock new images, and the gradually increasing difficulty will make completing the puzzle an engaging challenge. Intuitive touch controls create the feeling of actually touching every piece.

Soft and relaxing music helps you immerse yourself in the atmosphere, and after completing the puzzle, you can carefully examine the image and admire every detail.

Features:

• Convenient one-handed play.
• Realistic images of women.
• Full immersion thanks to touch controls.
• Gradual increase in level difficulty.
• Atmospheric soundtrack.
• Examine the picture after completing it.
